required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial of SHR-1701 With or Without Famitinib in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Clinical Trial of SHR-1701 With or Without Famitinib in the Treatment of Advanced or Metastatic NSCLC

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate the efficacy and safety of SHR-1701 with or without famitinib in patients with advanced or metastatic NSCLC

primary_outcome.time_frame: determined by RECIST v1.1, up to approximately 1 year

secondary_outcome.time_frame: determined by RECIST v1.1, up to approximately 1 year
determined by RECIST v1.1, up to approximately 1 year
determined by RECIST v1.1, up to approximately 1 year
determined by NCI-CTCAE V5.0, from the first drug administration to within 90 days for the last SHR-1701 dose
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events
